document.full_text: three alaskans have been indicted on charges of trafficking in hundreds of pounds of walrus tusks taken from a remote eskimo village in exchange for such items as cash, guns and marijuana, prosecutors said on thursday.
document.title: three alaskans accused of trafficking in walrus tusks
lines_and_colors: three alaskans have been indicted on charges of trafficking in hundreds of pounds of walrus tusks taken from a remote eskimo village in exchange for such items as cash, guns and marijuana, prosecutors said on thursday.
